buildBanner.title: Open the door to the world of paradise real estate with us!
buildBanner.quote: Property Library Phuket — your key to successful investments and a comfortable life on the island of Phuket.
buildBanner.buildApplication: Filter to find your ideal home

statistic.title: The perfect accommodation for your life

fieldsLeftDesc.field1: High service and individual approach to each client
fieldsLeftDesc.field3: Full support at all stages of the transaction
fieldsLeftDesc.field4: Careful selection of objects, verification of all documents

typesOfServices.proposal: We offer a wide range of services, respecting the high quality of service for our customers.
typesOfServices.purchaseProposal: We will find you the most liquid properties for living and investing in Phuket Island.
typesOfServices.postRealEstateProposal: Our specialists will help with the sale, as well as give you the opportunity to rent out your property with a 6-10% annual return.
typesOfServices.rentProposal: Personalized check-in preparation, airport pick-up, reliable service and ongoing support.

stages.title: We care about your comfort
stages.descriptionOfTheStages: We regularly update and analyze the market, providing our clients with up-to-date data to make informed decisions, and our specialists will provide you with comfort and reliability at every stage of the of the transaction.
stages.step1Description: We will select suitable objects, make an individual program of viewings, taking into account your wishes.
stages.step2Description: We will meet you at a convenient location in a comfortable car and show you the objects from our list.
stages.step3Description: We choose the project, get the most favorable terms from our company.
stages.step4Description: We will provide statutory documents, purchase agreement and tell you about the forms of real estate ownership.
stages.step5Description: We book the property, get a reservation agreement and pay the deposit.
stages.step6Description: We draw up the contract, make the deal and pay for the apartment.

services.title: Services
services.legalSupportDescription: Detailed study of the reputation of the builder, checking the availability of all necessary documents, the absence of encumbrances, liens. Assistance in opening a bank account, opening a company, assistance in real estate registration, acceptance of the object.
services.turnkeyConstructionDescription:
Full cycle of services - selection of land, 
 project approvals   and construction on it with a wealth of 
  experience in the market.
services.moneyTransfersDescription:
We help our clients to make safe 
  and fast currency transfers at favorable rates.
services.interiorDesignDescription:
The designers on our team can customize a high quality 
 furniture package, prepare the property for letting or sale, 
  increasing the value of the property 
  by an average of 8%.
services.ivisaProcessingDescription: We help our clients with visa processing. The official partner of the program is Thai Elite.
services.qualityControlDescription:
We conduct a thorough analysis of the real estate market, 
 study the developer's documents, check the quality 
 of construction and materials.

socialNetworkBlock.title: Our Instagram blog
socialNetworkBlock.description: Subscribe to us on Instagram to be the first to hear about all the news, new properties and great deals.

questions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
questions.description: Quick answers to questions you may have. Don't find what you're looking for? Request a free consultation.
questions.costDependence: What does the rental price depend on?
questions.confirmedBooking: When is a reservation considered confirmed?

consultation.title: Free consultation
consultation.description: If you have any questions, leave a request and we'll get back to you within 15 minutes.

welcomeBanner.title: Welcome to Property Library Phuket
welcomeBanner.subtitle: Your key to successful investments and a comfortable life on Phuket Island.

company.title: About the company
company.descriptionPart1:
Property Library Phuket is a team of professionals with extensive experience in real estate. I am Elnur Khankishiev, the founder of the agency.
 
  Our story began in 2011, when I moved from Russia and started a career in a travel company on the beautiful island of Phuket, the pearl of Southeast Asia.
company.descriptionPart2:
Since then, we have been successfully helping our clients find ideal objects for living and investing.
 
  Entrust your investments to us and we will help you realize your dreams in Phuket.

aboutUs.founderQuote: "Make the right choice with Property Library Phuket — your reliable partner in the real estate world."

fullService.title: Full range of services
fullService.subtitle: Join our community of successful investors and satisfied homeowners in Phuket.
fullService.professionalismSubtitle:
We are proud of our service,
  which includes the selection 
 of the most liquid real estate objects.
fullService.qualitySubtitle:
We conduct a detailed study of the reputation 
 of the developer, check  the availability 
  all documents and no encumbrances.
fullService.safetySubtitle:
The importance of compliance with quality
  and safety standards is a priority for us, and our 
 lawyers accompany you at the stage of the entire transaction.
fullService.constructionSubtitle:
Construction with a full cycle of services,
  as well as exclusive rights to cooperation:
  bonuses, favorable price, some of the best 
  view lots.

listingHero.title: Place your property on Property Library Phuket
listingHero.description: Place your object with us and open the doors to a quick and profitable sale. Our experience and wide customer base guarantee success. Make the right decision with Property Library Phuket.

conditions.apartmentEvaluationDescription:
Our experts will help you evaluate 
 the apartment and give practical recommendations 
  for the most profitable rental
conditions.searchForTenantsDescription:
We will inform our private and corporate 
 clients about renting an apartment
  and select a reliable tenant
conditions.apartmentDisplayDescription:
Entrust the display of the apartment to our 
  specialists and it will save you time 
 and allow you to choose the most favorable offer
conditions.contractDescription:
Approval and signing of a lease 
  agreement protecting your interests and its support 
  during the entire lease term

benefits.title: Profitable cooperation
benefits.description: Our experts will help with the sale of your real estate or land, and will also provide you with the opportunity to rent out your real estate with a yield of 6-10% per annum.
benefits.efficielyDescription: We provide a stable income of 6-10% per annum, professionally and responsibly manage your real estate.
benefits.profitablyDescription: Our exclusive offers allow you to maximize your investments and provide high returns.
benefits.carefreeDescription: Entrust us with all aspects of management and leasing, allowing yourself to enjoy the benefits of investment without hassle.
